snippet.title: Heartland To Go Off-Air? |Heartland Series
snippet.description:
#HeartlandSeries #AmberMarshall #AmyFleming
Hello heartland fans, how is everything going on? Welcome back to our channel UPCOMING SHOW. 
Heartland, one of the longest running Canadian series, has recently completed its 15th season and what we have felt is it is missing its originality. For all these seasons, though only few actors and characters have changed but absence of one character, exit of one actor from the show has completely changed the landscapes of heartland. yes we are talking about graham wardle aka ty borden of heartland. after graham’s exit from the show, the show has completely changed from overwhelming romantic family drama to depressive boring normal series. heartland was fan favourite all because of amy and ty and the base of its legacy was the story of amy and ty. Now since ty is absent its legacy is also almost gone.  So there are rumors that heartland 16 will be its last installment. It has been rumored that due to decresing trp and audiences loosing interest in the show, the makers and the channel cbc network has decided the show to go off air after heartland 16. So considering this we might not see heartland after upcoming season but, on a positive aspect, we might see return of ty borden in the show. Yes, you heard it right, if season 16 will be the last one, then it is possible that the makers would hear fans demand, and bring ty back. They could use the storyline of ty’s ghost coming to heartland, or ty coming in amy’s dream or better than that everything that had happened in season 13 was amy’s dream. Amy dreamt all those things but in reaity it never happened, ty was never shot and everything was back to normal. Or they can make a story that  amy had gone to coma after bullet hit her and everything she saw was just her nightmare and whe she wakes up from the coma she sees ty sitting next to her taking lindy in his lap along with the entire family.
